title: Error: The Grammarly add-in has stopped working
content:
If you see this error message, please copy the error code that you see and submit it in
a support request
to us for investigation.
If you donâ€™t see any error code or error details, please send us diagnostics information as per the instructions in
this article
.
Alternatively, we suggest switching to
Grammarly for Windows
(available on Windows 10 or newer)
. This product offering also supports integration with Microsoft Word and Outlook. To find out more, check out
this article
.
You can also give
the Grammarly Editor
a try. For more information about the Grammarly Editor, visit
this page
.
